article_title: Neiman Marcus’s Loss Narrows on Higher Sales
article_text:
Neiman Marcus Group’s fourth-quarter loss narrowed as the retailer reported higher sales.

Sales at established stores rose 1.9%, boosting results in a quarter that historically accounts for the lowest revenue as the retailer moves to clear inventory.

Dallas-based Neiman Marcus, which last month filed to go public, was bought in 2013 by...
